website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for a heavy-duty model will find their match in this nearly unbreakable floor squeegee.
pros: The squeegee's biggest claim-to-fame is its unbreakable handle, but it also features a curved body for easy cleaning and an all-weather sleeve for hand protection
cons: Assembly proves to be a little difficult, as instructions do not arrive with the product

customer_reviews.title: Even better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: The best way to fully appreciate the quality of this squeegee is to do what I did. Buy a standard squeegee from your local hardware store, use it on your surfaced garage floor for a couple years, and then get one of these. What was I thinking? Cut my water removal time by 2/3rds. No kidding.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Well built and strong
customer_reviews.text: Just what we need to move water puddles off the garage floor. Great to have the reversible blade to extend the life before replacement is needed. Strong handle with non-slip area makes it very useful. The complaints about assembly seem overstated. Took maybe 3-5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Probably a good idea, but poorly implemented.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it'll move water like all the other reviews say, but as someone in the construction field, I know that a lock washer has to be fully compressed (made flat) by the wing nut. Well, the wing nut will not go past a certain point, the lock washer is just sitting there, and the handle and the blade has a lot of play between them because the wing nut will not tighten! Fail.
customer_reviews.author: plaidshirts

customer_reviews.title: Flex sweep 24" Heavy duty  mm  mm
customer_reviews.text: The product flex sweep 24" commercial Heavy duty floor squeegee arrived very quickly we packaged from weather damage. The assembly of this flexs squeege is a little challenging but I was able complete it . Its strong appearance and constructed design looks great, but have not yet used it as the weather has been very sunny. But I am confident that it will work fine in pushing water from flat surfaces in the garage or patio floor.
customer_reviews.author: SURFERJOE

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: This is durable. So I dont want to discredit anything. Just we bought this for our new composite TimberTech decking and bought this squeegee to get the water off the deck after raining, and although this item.does a great job in most areas but on my deck it just doesnt clean a full area at a time. It leaves water behind. Not sure if squeegee or the decking wood. But still very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Liza S

customer_reviews.title: Finally I found THE ONE SOLUTION for a commercial Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I own a restaurant and the squeegees I could find at Lowes and Walmart would break every 4-6 weeks. I have been wasting literally hundreds of dollars per year on replacements. I bought one of this to try it and it has outlasted its peers. It's literally the best on the market. Plus the curved shape of the blade helps the cook leave the floors drier than its peers. Once you do the initial investment you will only need to switch the blades down the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Solorio

customer_reviews.title: Best Deck Squeegee Ever
customer_reviews.text: Just replaced my deck with Azek deckboards. Ordered this based on feedback and strength of handle. WOW - was I surprised on how great this squeegee works and leaves no marks. It not only moved the water, but cleaned the leaves and dirt like it was never there. The sturdy handle really helps to put downward pressure on the blade. Look no further - buy this squeegee!
customer_reviews.author: SitkaCedar

customer_reviews.title: We bought these and they are excellent. the best I have ever seen and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been in food service for 27 years and have been constantly replacing squeegees. We bought these and they are excellent. the best I have ever seen and they are seriously indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: matthew  a. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous squeegee
customer_reviews.text: follows minor surface unevennees and clears a wet spot in my garage quickly and easily. removes water and debris quickly and effectively after hosing down my shop floor. Sturdy handle and great overall piece. I hope it's as durable long term as it seems initially.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Wow amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is really a professional product which made cleaning our tile patio a breeze. It is havy duty and aomewhat heavy at first but once you have a grip of it everything is a smooth process. The rubber is of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amz_Reviewer1

customer_reviews.title: Great Deck Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: Mine included very good assembly instructions plus on the Amazon page they had a copy of the assembly instructions. It works perfectly in squeegeeing the rainwater off of my freshly stained deck that isn't going anywhere until I squeegee it. off.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S. Brady

customer_reviews.title: squuuueeegeeees well!!! So I’m told!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Finally used the squeegee and they are right, it is awesome! Excellent product! Highly recommend!!! I’ve not used this and plan to stay inside this winter so I don’t have to but my daughter and husband tell it works exceptionally well and I’ll just take their word for it!!
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: not all its cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: The foam rubber blade is garbage, we use on smooth, finished concrete and its like a grinder to the foam rubber. rubber bladed squeegees last for a year or so, and this has only been used for a couple days and has extreme wear already, it'll be wore completely out within the next ten days. very disappointed to say the least. not very keen on all the plastic components either. I was hoping to find something better! and this isn't it! unbreakable handle doesn't matter if the blades wear out weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy burns

customer_reviews.title: Great Squeegee . . .
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Bought to sweep off our slate patio that has lots of dew on it during winter months here in coastal Texas. Also for sweeping low spots on driveway after rains to prevent mildew/mold from forming. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying a second this works so well. Sturdy and effective. Have bent or broken so many of the thin single bladed ones in the past and this one lasts way longer and works so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality. Works to push water out of shop floor.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because when it snows/rains, water will leak into 1 corner of my shop through the bottom of the garage door. Also i use it to push snow and rain out of my shop due to it melting off of vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Houseboat Squeegee Is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Utilized for the top of my houseboat for rain and weekly cleaning. Area is 66 X 16...this is the best one I've ever seen. Great coverage and light enough for anyone to use. Great Value. I'd recommend paying more for this one than other lesser models on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Kind of amazing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really sturdy but light. It is industrial grade. I got it to sweep the water off my wooden deck. For the price, this thing is overkill. I can't imagine ever replacing it. Well, maybe the blade, of course, but not the rest. Works a treat.
customer_reviews.author: fUNWiThTyPiNg

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, heavy duty commercial squeegee. I use nightly on restaurant floors, best squeegee you can buy, totally worth price, I’d pay $40+ for this over $20 for a regular squeegee any day.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Marlier

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Like any squeegee that is new it takes some breaking in. I wish the blade was somewhat softer for better traction but it does a decent job. Will last a long time I am sure
customer_reviews.author: deadbirdgolf

customer_reviews.title: This has been the very best purchase I have ever made for any product ever
customer_reviews.text: This has been the very best purchase I have ever made for any product ever. Living in Wis. where we go from 60 degrees to blizzard conditions this keeps the snow out of my garage perfectly!!!! I LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Bengtson

customer_reviews.title: perfect for sweeping out water/ice/gravel in garage
customer_reviews.text: Bought to clean garage floor after driving thru snowy roads with gravel/salt... easy to use to sweep that stuff outta garage
customer_reviews.author: Marshall M.

customer_reviews.title: Way better than a rubber Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the rubber squeegee I bought for my garage floor. Tried it out last weekend and one swipe gave me a dry floor. The added flexibility over the rubber one I had helps keep contact with the floor to quickly and easily move water. Cost a little more but won't leave you disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NDeG

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes...Yes...Yes great buy. Love this thing.....saved us time in our basement getting water out.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Neese

customer_reviews.title: foam blade water squege
customer_reviews.text: product did what it said it would do. worked very well in removing the water from a rough concrete garage floor. Other rubber bladed products did not work at all, this foam blade did the job. Wish it was a little wider but works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim OB

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a “squeegee” to push water out of my garage genereally, and when having the garage washed. Works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: KZSNY

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed squeege
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, came as expected, been using all winter in shop for snow melt to push into drain. Will probably buy their broom as well this next year.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: works great on my patio
customer_reviews.text: works great on my patio. I have a carvestone surface, and it works great with it, even though it's not a very smooth surface
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Deck
customer_reviews.text: Good quality conctruction, solid handle, and blade. Use to ckear water off my composite deck, works great.
customer_reviews.author: jimessig

customer_reviews.title: Best squeegee I have used.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best squeegee I have used. The rubber is soft enough to really get the water and any sand and dirt moving toward the drain. The hardware is sturdy and stands up to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: ... because I got one already that I was not happy with. This one WAS HEAVY DUTY
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat hesitant to order this because I got one already that I was not happy with. This one WAS HEAVY DUTY! I am very happy with it. The handle is heavy duty and the squeegee is flexible enough to work well on my floor.
customer_reviews.author: KAKTUS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sqeege, use to after hosing the salt out of the garage
customer_reviews.author: Michael G

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty dual rubber squeege.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty squeegee, I used it on garage floor and concrete pavers and rear deck. Gets slush off easily and also deposits of water.
customer_reviews.author: FJV

customer_reviews.title: Life-Changing
customer_reviews.text: Seriously good product! Sweeps the water out of our old garage floor in a jiffy. My wife and I fight over who gets to use it!
customer_reviews.author: DougL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Perfect. Perfect. I had bought a few others at a local big box that did not do the job. This is well designed, rugged and squeegees as it should. Worth the extra few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: 70's TV is the best

customer_reviews.title: Great at getting water off the floors
customer_reviews.text: Have two of the units. Great at getting water off the floors. Will definitely get more!!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Now this is what a floor squeegee is supposed to be! Love it. Works really well in my shop.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMario3

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I just got it last night but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I just got it last night but it worked well this morning. I got it to remove the ice & snow melt off the car in the garage. It looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: South40

customer_reviews.title: Well made product.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed and it does the job ASAP. Quick clean-up and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H-Town

customer_reviews.title: 5🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.text: It is really industrial product. Clean very well. I do recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Eliziana Amud

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but I should have paid better attention to dimensions, to big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor decking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my new composite decking. In a couple of swipes, my deck is dry after rain. Hoping I can use it for light snow, as well.
customer_reviews.author: liesl

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it broke very soon after we got it. The pole bent and snapped.
customer_reviews.author: Assistant Director

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: Built to last! No breaking the handle on this one.
customer_reviews.author: DThom

customer_reviews.title: Like they say it is
customer_reviews.text: Great neoprene squeegee. wish it was 6" wider, and offered a strait model.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and useful
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly what we were looking for and has worked very well for our needs
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Moore

customer_reviews.title: Needed instructions for the not so savvy do it yourselfer.
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine after I was told I had assembled it all wrong! It would have been nice if instructions were included for assembling the squeegee as well as the brush!!! I almost didn't give it 5 stars, but it does work well when put together correctly. I am a 70+ year old woman .. give me a break!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blossom

customer_reviews.title: does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: we bought this to squeegy our pickleball court post rain. It works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Greenhosue
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for cleaning greenhouse floors. Good quality, and the handle doesn't come loose like every other one that I've used. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We needed something extremely durable and this has held up thus far. Feels sturdy, well built in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Grech

customer_reviews.title: WORKS PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to sweep away water at the indoor pool deck which is a semi-rough surface for safety/traction. This squeegee works perfectly! Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Better than all the rest
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Very sturdy and durable. Would recommend and would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: mary ann smith

customer_reviews.title: Very well built. It is not light but seems ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. It is not light but seems to clear the standing water on my back deck very well.
customer_reviews.author: E. Barden

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t we get this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: Great product to clean garage floor of snow and salt throughout the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: This squeegee is fantastic. I love it
customer_reviews.text: This squeegee is fantastic. I love it. It works great. My deck will last longer now that I can push the water off.
customer_reviews.author: robin massey

customer_reviews.title: Heavy corrosion after 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Used several times to clean garage floor. Hung on wall to dry. Heavy corrosion on all metal parts within 18 months. Will check with Flexsweep for credit.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Geither

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective with getting rid of water off my driveway and patio!
customer_reviews.author: Debra P.

customer_reviews.title: Should last a good long while
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty squeegee. Light weight aluminum handle that does indeed look to be indestructible for normal home usage.
customer_reviews.author: Russ F

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned out the garage and it work great with the excess water
customer_reviews.author: JPHARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've been using for months now and it has performed up to expectation!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to sweep my new rear deck after the rain. Easy to use and it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Wireless13

customer_reviews.title: Heavily Built
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly strong construction. The handle and squeegee head are heavily built. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plume

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: Great product built of really good quality material. It works well and I would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with it, very sturdy and worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and light at the same time because of the way it is designed, loved it!
customer_reviews.author: RICARDO X TORRES

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Cent
customer_reviews.text: Best ever...work great to clean up garage from dirt and snow melt!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great squeegee.
customer_reviews.text: This squeegee is topnotch. Quality product. I would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: detmemar

customer_reviews.title: Getting it done
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. This thing gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Product is sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Product is sturdy and well made. The curved ends makes it easier to remove the water. The ability to easily replace the rubber squeegee when worn is an added plus.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Light

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! We often have water on our garage floor. This squeegee not only clears away the water but aids in drying the floor. It makes cleanup so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: The kitchen people like it for daily clean up floor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the restaurant. The kitchen people like it for daily clean up floor.
customer_reviews.author: Herman W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: if you want one that works well, get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Deelstra

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fair price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fair price, bulletproof design, works great. The handle assembly will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Blain Burgess

customer_reviews.title: time will tell the whole story the squeegee portion looks like it will need replaced at some point but for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this now for about 2 months works very well, time will tell the whole story the squeegee portion looks like it will need replaced at some point but for now i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Stahly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and works great on my painted garage floor.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: See My Assembly Photos Attached
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions not provided. Here are photos that show how it should be put together. I don’t like it because the squeegee blade is foam, not a rubber blade like what I had before. So the foam blade doesn’t glide as easily across floor surfaces especially when it is stiff in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: BONIFIED

customer_reviews.title: A rubber blade would work better.
customer_reviews.text: Dissatisfied. This is a foam squeegee and it retains lots of moisture between pushes. Upon lifting to make the next pass the liquid drips from the foam and makes clearing all liquid from floor difficult. Push harder and even more liquid escapes. A rubber blade would work better.
customer_reviews.author: Pro-America

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality squeegee that appears to be built to last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Sixtyfootya

product_meta.title: FlexSweep Commercial 24" Heavy Duty Floor Squeegee By FlexSweep (Unbreakable Handle)
product_meta.description: 24" heavy duty curved floor squeegee. One handle for life - replace only the squeegee blades when worn. Advanced elastomer handle connector never breaks. All-weather sleeve protects your hands. Flip it over and use non-abrasive scraper. Double neoprene blades for excellent wiping and even when working on rough surfaces.
feature_bullets: Blades LAST TWICE AS LONG with Easy-Flip TM (Patent Pending)
Power-Push TM Curved Floor Squeegee with Scraper
Guaranteed Unbreakable Handle - One Handle For Life
MADE IN USA (With USA & Global Components) Because We Live Here!
